#summary Minimum Runtime Requirements
#sidebar TableOfContents

This version of the Flowplayer Open Ad Streamer has been tested with:

  * Flowplayer's [http://www.flowplayer.org 3.1.3] release

Please use this (or a later version) with the plugin.

In terms of protocol support, the release has been tested with:

  * HTTP progressive download using an [http://www.apache.org Apache] web server
  * HTTP progressive download using a [http://www.lighttpd.net Lighttpd] web server (with the [http://h264.code-shop.com/trac/wiki/Mod-H264-Streaming-Lighttpd-Version2 H.264 streaming module] also installed)
  * RTMP using an Adobe Flash Media Server (running on an [http://www.influxis.com Influxis] account)
